verbs.description: an ode to [V: lost] [ARG1: eyelashes] i want to tell you about my eyelashes the ones that fell out when i went through a really stressful overworked period about a decade ago because to me those eyelashes speak volumes arianna huffington dyspepsia midwestern united states twitter pilar gerasimo louise hay
